operations.name: run_command
operations.description: Executes Windows cmd.exe commands for file/directory operations with auto-correction. Pass ONLY executable commands (e.g., 'ren file1.txt file2.txt', 'mkdir folder', 'copy src.txt dest.txt', 'del file.txt', 'dir'). Supports all Windows file operations with syntax validation. Auto-converts common patterns (rename→ren, remove→del). Rejects natural language - requires valid Windows command syntax only.
